We flew over the region and evaluated impacts of disasters: housing, health, education, agriculture, roads and bridges. https://t.co/Dw2PAPyT7E
I have determined that the National Civil Defense goes to RS to support state and cities affected by emergency decree and reconstruction.
Workers with housing affected by disasters in cities with an emergency decree can move their FGTS account up to R $ 6,200.
I also went to Florianopolis. I'm sorry I could not make it to Rio do Sul because of bad weather. I want to express my solidarity with all affected families
The Ministers of National Integration, Labor and Welfare and the national secretary of Civil Defense accompanied me. #Solidarity.
I was with the governor Raimundo Colombo and the state secretary of Civil Defense at the Florianópolis airport. https://t.co/npAi3bALAR
Municipalities with state emergency decree will be recognized by the federal government. #Solidarity #Company
We will give full support to this affected population. #Solidarity #Company

We will inaugurate Taió and Ituporanga until the end of the year #Solidariedade #Parceria
I'm happy: the families of Xanxerê and Ponte Serrada stricken by the tornado in April are already living in their new homes. #Solidarity
I greet the spirit of solidarity of the people of Rio Grande do Sul and the people of Santa Catarina.

I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in which we adopted the general budget of the Federation for 2016 with a total of 48.5 billion dirhams https://t.co/2TtvViYdqW
55% of the budget of the Union for Social Development, Public Services, Health and Education, so that always develop and build the human is the firm approach in the march of the Union
We also adopted today the strategy of Emiratisation in the banking and insurance sector .. It is the most employment sector for citizens after the government https://t.co/rwHClzHVpl
Our goal is not only to settle jobs in the banking and insurance sector, but also to develop and qualify citizens to take up strategic positions in this vital sector
We have adopted the United Arab Emirates (UAE) file on climate change. Our goal is to produce 24% of the country's electricity from clean energy sources by 2021
Today we have adopted a decision to host the Arab Tourism Organization in Abu Dhabi. The UAE today is qualified to lead this sector in the Arab world and to consolidate Arab tourism globally
Today, we have adopted economic agreements, including the Trade Facilitation Agreement within the framework of the World Trade Organization in line with the economic approach open to the UAE

Today Iaired a cabinet meeting at which we approved a general federal budget for 2016 totaling AED 48.5 billion https://t.co/9S0CGn3qDb
55% of the budget is allocated to social development, public services, health and education. Our citizens remain our largest investment
We also approved an Emiratisation strategy for the banking and insurance sector, which is the second largest employer of UAE nationals
We aim not only to Emiratizing banking jobs, but also to develop and equip citizens to take on strategic roles in that vital sector
We agreed to host Arab Tourism Organization office in Abu Dhabi. The UAE is qualified to lead this sector and promote Arab tourism globally
We also approved UAE's climate action plan submitted to UNFCCC. We aim to produce 24% of our electricity from clean energy sources by 2021
